name: Threadwatcher
description: You sense the invisible threads connecting events and people.

effects.E: Hunch Blink – You sense lies or tension.
effects.C: Pattern Catch – Detects cause/effect or hidden intentions.
effects.A: Constellation Sight – See every link in a situation.

world_notes: Common among scholars, tacticians, and quiet planners.

name: Eggsense
description: You always know when an egg is about to crack.

effects.E: Egg Whisper – Feel eggs under pressure.
effects.C: Ovum Alarm – Sense cracking within 10 seconds.
effects.A: Scramble Shout – No known practical use.

world_notes: Mostly used to ruin breakfasts or impress chickens.

name: Soul Ease
description: When holding a dying person’s hand, they pass peacefully.

effects.E: Peace Touch – Calms panic in the terminally ill.
effects.C: Spirit Drift – Comforts others during grief.
effects.A: Final Blessing – Leaves behind a warm memory aura.

world_notes: Cherished by hospice workers and spiritual guides.

name: Dicebound
description: Your power is randomized — but always potent.

effects.E: Lucky Spark – Boost to first actions in an encounter.
effects.C: Chaos Draw – Random elemental effects on interaction.
effects.A: Gambler’s Throne – Unleash a game-breaking power… or backfire.

world_notes: Loved by gamblers, hated by commanders.
